objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#cc0000;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e53935;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='triangle-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD54F;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF8F00;stop-opacity:0.5'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><path d='M0,0 L400,0 L0,400 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080,1080 L680,1080 L1080,680 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M850,0 L1080,0 L1080,230 Z' fill='url(#triangle-gradient)'/><path d='M0,850 L0,1080 L230,1080 Z' fill='url(#triangle-gradient)'/><polygon points='540,150 640,320 440,320' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.1'/><polygon points='840,600 940,770 740,770' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.4'/><polygon points='200,500 300,670 100,670' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='980' height='980' rx='20' fill='none' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.3)' stroke-width='5'/></svg>

objects.text:
Pack of 64 snack-size bags Classic
crunch & bold flavor Perfect for parties
gatherings Savory three-cheese blend

product_details.description: Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and dynamic layout designed to showcase a snack product. The background is a gradient of deep red shades with angular design elements and transparent geometric overlays, creating a lively and energetic aesthetic. The "heading" text is large and playful in white, drawing immediate attention. Beneath it, the "subheading" uses bold yellow text to highlight the product name. A decorative white line separates the header elements from the "description", which uses small white text to detail the product features. Below, the "price" is prominently displayed in bold white, with a bright yellow "cta_button" containing the bold black "cta" text. The "product_image" of the snack bag is positioned prominently to the right, emphasizing the brand and flavor. The banner uses a clean layout with a modern and attention-grabbing typographic hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red: #cc0000
- Bright Red: #e53935
- Yellow Accent: #FFD54F
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
product_color: The Doritos Nacho Cheese product image utilizes a bold and high-contrast color palette to evoke excitement and flavor intensity. Dominated by a vibrant fiery red background (#C8102E), the design grabs attention and stimulates appetite. The Doritos chips themselves are a rich cheese-covered orange-yellow (#FBAF42), creating a warm contrast against the red. The logo combines black (#000000), white (#FFFFFF), and gradients of orange and yellow (#FF9F00, #FFD700) to form dynamic visual depth. Colors are well-blended through shading and glossy effects, yet sharply highlighted with contrasting edges. This palette projects boldness and energy—ideal for creating an eye-catching advertisement banner.
